alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 20 at 1:18PM AKST until February 24 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 18 inches possible along and west of the Dalton Highway. * WHERE...Southeastern Brooks Range along and west of the Dalton Highway. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall will beginning Tuesday evening and continue into Thursday evening. The heaviest snowfall is expected along and west of the Dalton Highway.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
